forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 76. North northwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. North northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
A splendid day unfurls over Downtown San Francisco, bathed in the gentle embrace of sunshine with temperatures poised to reach a delightful 76 degrees. The north-northwest wind whispers softly, adding a refreshing touch to the atmosphere as it meanders through the city streets. The horizon glistens with clarity, free from the usual cloak of fog, inviting residents to relish every moment.

As the day drifts toward evening, expect the sky to remain mostly clear, with temperatures cooling gracefully to around 56 degrees. This comforting transition sets the perfect backdrop for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a serene visit to one of the local parks, where the vibrant colors of spring bloom in harmony with the warm sunlight. A light jacket may be prudent as twilight approaches, ensuring a cozy experience while you soak in the beauty of this exceptional day. Embrace the call of outdoor adventures, be it a quiet café retreat or leisurely exploration of the city's artistic enclaves.
